name: Hydration Hunt (JustinaY)
description:
Hydration Hunt is a four player asymmetric multiplayer game in which players compete for the most valuable resources around: Water!

Team Members:

Justina: Environment and Main Programmer

Shantanu: Sound Design and Programmer

Harris: Character Design and Character Animation

Controls:

Left Joystick: Move

Square: Attack/Shooting to knock water out from others

Triangle: Special Abiltiy

Circle: Move Ability

X: Jump
